## Checklist

Please confirm the following before submitting:

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] My file is named `quote-myname.json` (lowercase, hyphens only)
- [ ] All my quote IDs follow the pattern `myname-001` (lowercase, hyphens, numbers)
- [ ] My quotes are original or properly attributed
- [ ] I have **not** included copyrighted material without permission
- [ ] My content is appropriate for an educational setting
- [ ] I ran `npm run dev` and validation passed with no errors

## Content source

- [ ] Original content I wrote
- [ ] AI-assisted (I included `prompt_notes` in my entries)
- [ ] Other (please explain below)
